column4: I have a program with a file opened which ceased to exist because a device was unplugged. SIGKILL has no effect, it has status "running" and uses 100% sys. Can it be killed?
but kill -9 and killall -KILL have no effect...
The file it was reading has since been deleted using another computer.. would it still have any effect?
Why don't you restart your system?
Well I didn't notice it for about a week and I have two cores so it's not detrimental and it's inetresting..
Got no idea what to do...
That's fine. Is it worth a bug report?
very probably, you could have an issue here
